summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Turkish accounting application (Opensoftt Muhasebe). Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend testing shows excellent functionality with minor UI issue in payment customer selection dropdown.

ui_bugs.issue: Customer selection dropdown has visibility issues - options are not properly visible when selecting
ui_bugs.workaround: Customer can still be selected but requires multiple attempts

passed_tests: Dashboard stats display (alacak, bor√ß, cariler, kasa)
Payment CRUD operations (with minor UI issue)
Excel export functionality for all report types
Settings page and user info display
All backend API endpoints (18/18 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix customer selection dropdown visibility issue in PaymentForm component. The dropdown options are not properly visible when trying to select a customer, though functionality still works with persistence.
